pageContext.claim: “Jeff Sessions was a disaster. … He came to see me four times just begging me to be attorney general. He wasn't, you know, to me equipped to be attorney general, but he just wanted it, wanted it, wanted it.”
pageContext.analysis: If Trump thought Sessions was not equipped to be attorney general, why would he nominate him? “I never begged for the job of Attorney General, not 4 times, not 1 time, not ever,” Sessions said. “The President offered me the job, I took it, I stood up for the truth and performed at the highest levels.”
